segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching as high as he can, balancing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous for him, hoping he doesn't take a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is patiently waiting, her eyes fixed on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies when their mother isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused on her task, completely unaware of the water or the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit frustrated that she isn't paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, creating such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really tell her what's happening before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so calm, it's almost ironic compared to the inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
